comment: -Mr. Roose is the New York Times bestselling author of two books, Young Money (2014) and The Unlikely Disciple (2009) -He graduated from Brown University -in he was named to Forbes's Under list Today, he eclipsed all that.
amr:
# ::snt -Mr. Roose is the New York Times bestselling author of two books, Young Money (2014) and The Unlikely Disciple (2009) -He graduated from Brown University -in he was named to Forbes's Under list Today, he eclipsed all that.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / author-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mr."
                        :op2 "Roosevelt"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (b / book
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Young"
                              :op2 "Money")
                        :time (d / date-entity
                              :year 2014))
                  :op2 (b2 / book
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "The"
                              :op2 "Unlikely"
                              :op3 "Disciple")
                        :time (d2 / date-entity
                              :year 2009)))
            :mod (b3 / bestselling)
            :mod (n4 / newspaper
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "New"
                        :op2 "York"
                        :op3 "Times")))
      :snt2 (g / graduate-01
            :ARG1 (h / he)
            :ARG2 (u / university
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Brown"
                        :op2 "University"))
            :snt3 (e / eclipse-01
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (t / that
                        :mod (a3 / all))
                  :time (n7 / name
                        :op1 "Today"))))
